tweet.Original_tweet: oggi va tutto storto!
tweet.Translate_tweet: Today everything goes wrong!

tweet.Original_tweet: a giocare a calcio mi sono storto una caviglia, accidenti!
tweet.Translate_tweet: playing football I twisted an ankle, damn!

tweet.Original_tweet: sono davvero desolato di non poter più vedere llr tutti i giorni
tweet.Translate_tweet: I'm really sorry for not being able to see LLR every day

tweet.Original_tweet: oggi la corriera era in ritardo di 50 minuti, sono infuriata
tweet.Translate_tweet: Today the bus was delayed by 50 minutes are angry

tweet.Original_tweet: mia sorella mi ha tirato i capelli e mi ha fatto molto male
tweet.Translate_tweet: my sister has pulled her hair and made me very ill

tweet.Original_tweet: sono disperato perchè non trovo più le chiavi della macchina
tweet.Translate_tweet: I'm desperate because I can not find my car keys

tweet.Original_tweet: sono davvero arrabbiata perchè mi hanno rubato la borsa
tweet.Translate_tweet: I'm really angry because they stole the bag

tweet.Original_tweet: sono triste perchè il programma non capisce l'ironia
tweet.Translate_tweet: I'm sad because the program does not understand the irony

tweet.Original_tweet: sono stufa di scrivere frasi random per popolare il database
tweet.Translate_tweet: I'm sick of writing random sentences to populate the database

tweet.Original_tweet: quando non ci si può guadagnare il pane, si perde la dignità. questo è un dramma di oggi, specialmente per i giovani
tweet.Translate_tweet: when you can not earn your bread, you lose your dignity. This is a drama of today, especially for young people

tweet.Original_tweet: se noi siamo troppo attaccati alla ricchezza, non siamo liberi. siamo schiavi
tweet.Translate_tweet: if we are too attached to the wealth, we are not free. we are slaves

tweet.Original_tweet: alitalia divorzia da air france: nel 2017 fine della partnership
tweet.Translate_tweet: alitalia divorces air france: in 2017 the end of the partnership

tweet.Original_tweet: il 96% delle aziende confiscate alla mafia fallisce. servono manager adeguati
tweet.Translate_tweet: 96% of businesses confiscated from the mafia fails. managers need adequate

tweet.Original_tweet: in sei anni di crisi poveri cresciuti da 11 a 15 milioni
tweet.Translate_tweet: in six years of crisis poor grew from 11 million to 15 million

tweet.Original_tweet: sono vicino alle famiglie delle vittime e dei feriti e ai nostri uomini in divisa rimasti coinvolti oggi nella sparatoria a napoli
tweet.Translate_tweet: They are close to the families of those killed and injured and to our men in uniform were involved in the shooting today in Naples

tweet.Original_tweet: oggi nel kebab c'erano dei capelli, che schifo
tweet.Translate_tweet: today in the kebab he had hair, yuck

tweet.Original_tweet: nepal, nuovo terremoto di magnitudo 7.4
tweet.Translate_tweet: nepal, new earthquake of magnitude 7.4

tweet.Original_tweet: molotov e bombe carta dai black bloc, un disastro a milano
tweet.Translate_tweet: molotov bombs and paper by black bloc, a disaster in milan

tweet.Original_tweet: scuola: 5 per mille stralciato dalla riforma
tweet.Translate_tweet: school: 5 per thousand dropped by the reform

tweet.Original_tweet: non passerò mai analisi matematica 1
tweet.Translate_tweet: I would never pass calculus 1

tweet.Original_tweet: mia mamma è morta e sono tristissima, ho pianto tutto il giorno
tweet.Translate_tweet: My mother died and are sad, I cried all day

tweet.Original_tweet: carpi: vola a terra dalla giostra, ferita bambina di 9 anni
tweet.Translate_tweet: carpi fly to earth from the carousel, wound 9 year old

tweet.Original_tweet: È la quarta rapina,ora le botte. adesso ho paura
tweet.Translate_tweet: It is the fourth robbery, now the beating. Now I'm afraid

tweet.Original_tweet: l’aereo si schianta: feriti i due piloti
tweet.Translate_tweet: the plane crashes: two injured riders

tweet.Original_tweet: rapine violente: arrestati i due banditi
tweet.Translate_tweet: violent robberies: the two bandits arrested

tweet.Original_tweet: si schianta aereo ultraleggero, due feriti gravi a pavullo
tweet.Translate_tweet: Ultralight plane crashes, two seriously injured in pavullo

tweet.Original_tweet: plus on aime, plus on souffre. la somme des douleurs possibles pour chaque âme est proportionnelle à son degré de perfection
tweet.Translate_tweet: the more you love, the more we suffer. the amount of pain possible for every soul is proportional to its degree of perfection

tweet.Original_tweet: si un humain n'est pas capable de percevoir la douleur d'un autre, il serait justifié de lui retirer sa qualité d'homme.
tweet.Translate_tweet: if a human being is not able to perceive the pain of another, it would be justified to dismiss him as a man.

tweet.Original_tweet: si notre coeur ne répond pas à la joie suprême il répond à la douleur suprême.
tweet.Translate_tweet: if our heart does not respond to the supreme joy it meets the Supreme pain.

tweet.Original_tweet: la mort est une valeur invariable alors que la douleur est une variable susceptible de croître indéfiniment.
tweet.Translate_tweet: death is a fixed value so that pain is a variable that to grow indefinitely.

tweet.Original_tweet: nos douleurs ennuient ceux qu'elles n'attristent pas.
tweet.Translate_tweet: our sorrows bore those they do not sadden.

tweet.Original_tweet: l’une des plus grandes douleurs est d’aimer une personne que tu ne peux pas avoir.
tweet.Translate_tweet: one of the greatest pain is to love someone you can not have.

tweet.Original_tweet: le silence c'est aussi la douleurs d'être rester seul trop longtemps.
tweet.Translate_tweet: silence is also the pain of being left alone too long.

tweet.Original_tweet: on dit souvent que le temps guérit les blessures. je ne suis pas d'accord. les blessures demeurent intactes.
tweet.Translate_tweet: often said that time heals wounds. I do not agree. injuries remain intact.

tweet.Original_tweet: la douleur qui se tait n'en est que plus funeste.
tweet.Translate_tweet: pain that is silent is all the more fatal.

tweet.Original_tweet: les grandes douleurs sont muettes.
tweet.Translate_tweet: great sorrows are mute.

tweet.Original_tweet: wenn ich die wahl habe zwischen dem nichts und dem schmerz, dann wähle ich den schmerz.
tweet.Translate_tweet: if I have the choice between nothing and the pain, then I choose the pain.

tweet.Original_tweet: wir streben mehr danach, schmerz zu vermeiden als freude zu gewinnen.
tweet.Translate_tweet: we strive more after that to avoid pain than to gain pleasure.

tweet.Original_tweet: das leben ist voller leid, krankheit, schmerz – und zu kurz ist
tweet.Translate_tweet: life is full of suffering, sickness, pain - and is too short

tweet.Original_tweet: polemica sull'immigrazione, renzi: "da psicanalisi chi critica il fermo"
tweet.Translate_tweet: debate on immigration, renzi "by psychoanalysis critics latch"

tweet.Original_tweet: in strada corpi decapitati di soldati siriani
tweet.Translate_tweet: in road decapitated bodies of Syrian soldiers

tweet.Original_tweet: l'esercito si ritira e bombarda zona monumentale
tweet.Translate_tweet: the army retreats and bombards monumental area

tweet.Original_tweet: gli usa inviano armi pesanti a iraq, arabia saudita e isreale
tweet.Translate_tweet: the usa send heavy weapons in Iraq, Saudi Arabia and Isreal

tweet.Original_tweet: scuola, sindacati confermano lo sciopero un'ora di protesta nei 2 giorni di scrutini
tweet.Translate_tweet: school, unions confirm hour protest strike in two days of ballots

tweet.Original_tweet: e la fascia più bassa ha sentito di più la crisi
tweet.Translate_tweet: and the lower end has felt the crisis more

tweet.Original_tweet: guerre, tortura, razzismo e censura 2015 l'anno zero dei diritti umani
tweet.Translate_tweet: wars, torture, racism and censorship in 2015 the year zero of human rights

tweet.Original_tweet: lucca, non si apre il paracadute muore in esercitazione giovane alpino
tweet.Translate_tweet: Lucca, does not open the parachute dies in training young Alpine

tweet.Original_tweet: maltempo, a vercelli automobilista schiacciato e ucciso da albero caduto
tweet.Translate_tweet: bad weather, in vercelli motorist crushed and killed by fallen tree

tweet.Original_tweet: genova, in ospedale operaio sfiorato dal fulmine
tweet.Translate_tweet: genoa, hospital worker touched by lightning

tweet.Original_tweet: sono desolato, ma non sono riuscito a risolvere il problema
tweet.Translate_tweet: I am sorry, but I could not solve the problem
